heading: MY PROJECTS
about_box_first_line: I'm Olga and I'm a web developer.
about_box_second_line: My way in programming started after several years in banking. Thanks to my previous experience, I possess analytic mind, I can search and systematize a large amount of information, in the same time understanding the importance of deadlines.
about_box_third_line: About 3 years ago I found myself in web development. Coding became my passion. I love to create beautifully designed, intuitive, functional websites and apps.
contact_description: If you have any questions about my services, or just want to say hello, feel free to contact me.
